Replace patterns in a string

Source: R/utils.R
string_replace.Rd

For a given character string, replace patterns with values.

string_replace(string, patterns, values)

Arguments

string

Text
patterns

Patterns to replace with values
values

Values to be put in place

Value

character

See also

Other utils: description_get(), examples_get(), file_create(), pkgdetails_get(), pkgnm_get(), tags_get(), templates_get(), yaml_get()
